verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Send down Your Spirit,
O Lord, upon Your people.
Send forth Your light and Your truth,
renew this land.
Kindle a fire in our hearts, revive our
nation,
And we will proclaim Your name
Through all the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are a chosen race, a royal
Priesthood,
A holy nation, God's own people,
That we may proclaim the mighty
deeds of Him who called us
Out of darkness into the light.
